DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effectiveness psychotherapeutic intervention model nurse nursing diagnosis `` Anxiety '' . A pilot randomise control trial carry test procedure acceptability , estimate likely rate recruitment retention subject , calculation appropriate sample size . Moreover , pilot study aim test hypothesis .
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim evaluate effectiveness psychotherapeutic intervention model nurse regard nursing diagnosis `` Anxiety '' ( accord International Classification Nursing Practice ( ICNP ) /North American Nursing Diagnoses Association ( NANDA ) standardize nursing language ) . A pilot randomise control trial carry test procedure acceptability , estimate likely rate recruitment retention subject , calculation appropriate sample size . Moreover , pilot study aim test hypothesis . In double-blinded nurse-led 4 month control trial , conduct hospital outpatient set Portugal , 60 patient anxiety randomise intervention ( n=30 ) control group ( n=30 ) . The objective compare outcomes associate `` treatment usual '' benefit implement psychotherapeutic intervention model nurse previously develop ( 5 session ) , evaluate use Nursing Outcomes Classification ( NOC ) outcomes `` Anxiety Level '' `` Anxiety Self-Control '' ( Portuguese version ) .
DOC.criteria: 1864 year old ; Nursing Diagnosis `` Anxiety '' ( accord ICNP/NANDA standardize nursing language ) assessment use NOC outcome `` Anxiety Level '' ( Portuguese version ) ; Elementary education ( complete ) . Being therapy provide psychologist ( moment session 0 ) ; Severe cognitive deficit ( assessment use MiniMental State Examination ) ; Intellectual disability ; Confusional state ; Severe delusion and/or hallucination ; Psychomotor agitation .
